app.apiKeyWarning: API_KEY not found. Using data without images. Please set the API_KEY environment variable for image generation.
app.initializationError: An unexpected error occurred during initialization. Please check the console for details.
app.saveError: Could not save project data. The browser's storage might be full or corrupted.
app.loadError: Error loading file. See console for details.
app.resetConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset the project? This will delete all your current styles and axes and cannot be undone.
app.resetError: Could not reset project. See console for details.

sidebar.title: Style Visualizer
sidebar.calculateOnFilteredTooltip: If enabled, UMAP/PCA is calculated only using the styles that pass the active filters.
sidebar.calculateKTooltip: Calculate optimal k using Silhouette Score
sidebar.notEnoughStylesForK: Not enough styles to calculate a cluster count.
sidebar.kCalculationError: Could not calculate an optimal number of clusters.
sidebar.projectionDataUnavailable: {mode} data not available. Please wait for the projection to be calculated.

rightSidebar.addFilterError: Create an axis before adding a filter.

visualization.selectAxisMessage: Select an axis to begin visualization.
visualization.selectYAxisMessage: Select a Y axis for 2D visualization.
visualization.selectZAxisMessage: Select a Z axis for 3D visualization.
visualization.stackTooltip: Stack of {count} styles. Click to expand.

styleEditorModal.generateDescriptionTooltip: Generate description from name and reference images
styleEditorModal.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the style or generate one with AI...
styleEditorModal.rewriteDescriptionButton: Rewrite Description with AI (using {count} selected image)
styleEditorModal.rewriteDescriptionButtonPlural: Rewrite Description with AI (using {count} selected images)
styleEditorModal.generationPromptPlaceholder: What to generate in this style. e.g., 'A photorealistic cat wearing a tiny hat.'
styleEditorModal.recalculateScoresButton: Recalculate Scores with AI (using {count} selected image)
styleEditorModal.recalculateScoresButtonPlural: Recalculate Scores with AI (using {count} selected images)
styleEditorModal.noAxesWarning: No axes created yet. Add an axis to start scoring.
styleEditorModal.gallerySectionSubtitle: Select images to use them as references for AI analysis.
styleEditorModal.generateImageTooltip: Generate a new image for this style using AI
styleEditorModal.imageAddErrorDuplicate: This image has already been added.
styleEditorModal.corruptedImageError: Could not process a local image. It might be corrupted.

axisEditorModal.analyzeAndScoreButton: Analyze & Score All Styles with AI
axisEditorModal.analyzeAndScoreTooltip: Use AI to automatically score all styles based on this axis's name and description.
axisEditorModal.analysisSuccess: Analysis complete! {count} styles scored. Scores will be applied when you save.
axisEditorModal.manuallyScoreTooltip: Save the current axis details and open a wizard to score each style manually.

scoringWizardModal.title: Score Styles for "{axisName}"
scoringWizardModal.description: Set a score from {min} to {max} for each style on the new axis.
scoringWizardModal.noImagesTooltip: No images available for this style

correlationModal.title: Axis Correlation Analysis
correlationModal.descriptionList: This list shows pairs of axes with a Pearson correlation coefficient stronger than the selected threshold. This helps identify redundant or related axes.
correlationModal.notEnoughAxes: You need at least two axes to calculate correlations.
